com.cmput301.cs.project.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.controllers.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Logs a user in by checking Elastic search and stores their username in shared_preferences for offline logins. If no internet is available it loads the most recent from shared_preferences. New ones are added automatically
